html:
2022-02-15

---------------- WIELTON - Listed trailers and semi-trailers producer Wielton's UK-based unit Lawrence David will provide several hundred semi-trailers to Amazon UK Services for ca. PLN 120 mln net total to end-2022, Wielton said in a market filing. The order comes in the frame of a framework deal between the companies inked back in 2018.

Warsaw stocks are posting solid gains, with the large-cap WIG20 index up by 2.22% to 2,209.86 pts at 15:39 local time on share price increases reported by 19 blue chips, led by retailer Dino witj 5.33%.

---------------- WIELTON - Listed trailers and semi-trailers producer Wielton's UK-based unit Lawrence David will provide several hundred semi-trailers to Amazon UK Services for ca. PLN 120 mln net total to end-2022, Wielton said in a market filing. The order comes in the frame of a framework deal between the companies inked back in 2018.

The final value of the order will depend on changes to component and labor costs, Wielton noted.
